analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose this rule. The functioning of our government and its service to us United States citizens has already been damaged by indiscriminate cuts to the federal workforce, and this rule will further erode the ability of the federal government to do its work, work that my taxes pay for.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and emphasizes the importance of employee protections and the functioning of government, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and due process rights.
